easy.question: Which team won the 2020 World Series?
easy.hint: They defeated the Tampa Bay Rays in six games.

easy.question: Which player holds the MLB record for most home runs in a single season?
easy.hint: He hit 73 home runs in 2001 for the San Francisco Giants.

easy.question: Which team did Derek Jeter play his entire MLB career for?
easy.hint: He was the captain of this team and won five World Series with them.

easy.question: Which pitcher threw a perfect game in the 2010 season?
easy.hint: This Phillies pitcher also threw a no-hitter in the playoffs that same year.

easy.question: Which team broke the 'Curse of the Bambino' by winning the 2004 World Series?
easy.hint: They came back from a 3-0 deficit against the Yankees in the ALCS that year.

medium.question: Which player hit a walk-off home run to win the 1993 World Series?
medium.hint: His home run off Mitch Williams gave the Blue Jays their second consecutive championship.

medium.question: Which pitcher holds the record for most strikeouts in a single season?
medium.hint: He struck out 383 batters in 1973 with the California Angels.

medium.question: Which team won three consecutive World Series from 1972-1974?
medium.hint: They were managed by Dick Williams and featured stars like Reggie Jackson and Catfish Hunter.

medium.question: Which player was the first to have his number retired by all MLB teams?
medium.hint: His number 42 was universally retired in 1997, 50 years after he broke the color barrier.

medium.question: Which pitcher threw a no-hitter while on LSD in 1970?
medium.hint: This Pirates pitcher later became an anti-drug advocate.

hard.question: Which player holds the record for most consecutive games played (2,632)?
hard.hint: This Orioles shortstop/third baseman broke Lou Gehrig's previous record of 2,130 games.

hard.question: Which pitcher threw 7 no-hitters in his career, the most in MLB history?
hard.hint: This power pitcher also holds the record for most career strikeouts.

hard.question: Which team came back from a 3-0 deficit to win a playoff series in 2004?
hard.hint: They accomplished this against the Yankees in the ALCS before winning the World Series.

hard.question: Which player hit 4 home runs in a single game on June 6, 2017?
hard.hint: This Reds second baseman was an unlikely candidate to join this exclusive club.

hard.question: Which pitcher holds the record for most wins in a single season in the modern era (post-1900)?
hard.hint: He won 41 games for the New York Highlanders (later Yankees) in 1904.
